class.name: ReSharperInspections
class.description: An [Inspections (ReSharper) build step](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?inspections-resharper) for gathering JetBrains ReSharper inspection results.

function.name: reSharperInspections

param.name: dotnet-tools-inspectcode.solution
param.description: The path to the .sln file created by Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 or later. The specified path should be relative to the checkout directory.

param.name: dotnet-tools-inspectcode.project.filter
param.description: Project name wildcards to analyze only a part of the solution. Leave blank to analyze the whole solution. Separate wildcards with new lines.

param.name: jetbrains.resharper-clt.clt-path
param.description: A custom path to R# CLT Home Directory. Paths relative to the checkout directory are supported. The value can reference to JetBrains ReSharper Command Line Tool specified via Administration | Tools.

param.name: jetbrains.resharper-clt.platform
param.description: Select the platform bitness of the InspectCode tool. To find code issues in C++ projects, use the x86 platform. The cross-platform inspections are also supported in ReSharper 2020.2.1 or later.

param.name: jetbrains.resharper-clt.plugins
param.description: Newline-delimited list of ReSharper plugins required for InspectCode in the following format: - Download %pluginId%/%version% - File %filePath% - Folder %folderPath% To download plugins add the https://resharper-plugins.jetbrains.com/api/v2/ NuGet package source.

param.name: dotnet-tools-inspectcodeCustomSettingsProfile
param.description: The path to the file containing ReSharper settings created with JetBrains ReSharper 6.1 or later. The specified path should be relative to the checkout directory. If specified, this settings layer has the top priority, so it overrides ReSharper build-in settings. By default, build-in ReSharper settings layers are applied.

param.name: dotnet-tools-inspectcode.debug
param.description: Check this option to include debug messages in the build log and publish the file with additional logs (dotnet-tools-inspectcode.log) as a hidden artifact.

param.name: dotnet-tools-inspectcode.customCmdArgs
param.description: Specify newline-separated command line parameters to add to calling inspectCode.exe.
